title: I WANT BACK MY LP
body:
i was is a loading screen  for my rank game and I was booted off  trying to get back it when it  it did the game was remake and I lost 21 lp 
****

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the LP, but I'd like to help get this resolved to prevent more issues like that in the future.  It sounds like your network is having an issue reaching the game server, so you kind of got left behind.  My suggestion for this case would be to go over each instruction of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!

And why should you get your lp back? Your team was 4v5 and remade. You were not in the game and got punished for it. Then they would have to take away all punishments for leaving cause everyone could have technical problems. Then there would be no more games.
